00018 #ifndef PAGINGLandScapeRAYSCENEQUERY_H
00019 #define PAGINGLandScapeRAYSCENEQUERY_H

00024 namespace Ogre
00025 {
00026 
00027         typedef enum RaySceneQueryFlags
00028         {
00029                 // Height will return the height at the origin
00030                 // Distance will always be 0
00031                 RSQ_Height       = 1<<0,
00032 
00033                 // AllTerrain will return all terrain contacts
00034                 // along the ray
00035                 RSQ_AllTerrain   = 1<<1,
00036 
00037                 // FirstTerrain will return only the first
00038                 // contact along the ray
00039                 RSQ_FirstTerrain = 1<<2,
00040 
00041                 // Entities will return all entity contacts along the ray
00042                 RSQ_Entities     = 1<<3,
00043 
00044                 // Different resolution scales.  It defaults to 1 unit
00045                 // resolution.  2x resolution tests every 0.5 units
00046                 // 4x tests every 0.25 and 8x every 0.125
00047                 //RSQ_8xRes        = 1<<4, // removed to get only 8 flags.
00048                 RSQ_4xRes        = 1<<4,
00049                 RSQ_2xRes        = 1<<5,
00050                 RSQ_1xRes        = 1<<6,
00051 
00052                 // Height will return the height at the origin
00053                 // Distance will always be 0
00054         // without interpolation = Much faster but
00055         // wrong between points.
00056         RSQ_Height_no_interpolation =  1<<7,
00057         };
00058
